statements: SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT package_name, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, package_name FROM subscriptions WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE package_name = 'Gold' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT package_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY package_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_subscriptions FROM subscriptions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM subscriptions WHERE package_name IN ('Gold', 'Platinum');
SELECT user_id, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS subscription_days FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_days DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_id ASC;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, subscription_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT s.subscription_id, s.start_date, p.amount FROM subscriptions s JOIN payments p ON s.subscription_id = p.subscription_id WHERE p.amount > 100 ORDER BY s.start_date DESC;
SELECT p.payment_id, s.customer_id, p.payment_date FROM payments p JOIN subscriptions s ON p.subscription_id = s.subscription_id WHERE s.customer_id = 200 ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;

SELECT s.subscription_id, s.start_date, p.payment_date, p.amount FROM subscriptions s JOIN payments p ON s.subscription_id = p.subscription_id WHERE s.customer_id = 300 AND p.amount < 50 ORDER BY s.start_date ASC, p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE plan_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, billing_id, card_number FROM subscriptions s JOIN billing_info b ON s.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_transaction_date FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'successful';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, subscription_plan, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id > 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM billing_info WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY subscription_id DESC;

SELECT users.username, billing_info.card_number, payment_transactions.amount, payment_transactions.status FROM users INNER JOIN billing_info ON users.user_id = billing_info.user_id INNER JOIN payment_transactions ON users.user_id = payment_transactions.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_payments.payment_date, payment_transactions.amount, payment_transactions.status FROM users JOIN user_payments ON users.user_id = user_payments.user_id JOIN payment_transactions ON user_payments.transaction_id = payment_transactions.transaction_id WHERE user_payments.payment_date >= '2022-04-01';
